directions.content: Click the answer that uses the correct object adjective clause to combine each set of sentences. Click Submit to check your answers.

question.content: I bought a car. It was dark blue.

option.content: I bought a car and it was dark blue.

I bought a car because it was dark blue.

question.content: I know a man. He was born in Tokyo.

option.content: The man who(m) I know was born in Tokyo.

option.content: I saw a movie star that was wearing dark sunglasses.
